resources.string: Synopsis: You meet the love of your life one way or other
A sign post with two signs pointing in opposite directions

Hello fellow traveler,\n Welcome to Fate, an interactive app that allows you to take control of your own journey. First you choose a story to get started. As you move along the story you will occasionally be presented with choices and you can click on the corresponding buttons to make your choice. If it is too hard to make a choice, you can use our coin flip tool (shown below) to make a decision! These decisions determine your end destination. Immerse yourself into a world of wonder.\n Good luck and take care, The Creator
